cons: Avoid Thyme During Pregnancy And Breastfeeding.

description: It is effective in fighting the bacteria that causes skin acne.
Thyme helps in maintaining skin health by eliminating the bacteria that is responsible for causing various skin problems.
Thyme essential oil encourages hair growth as well as combats various hair problems.
Thyme is its effectiveness in treating menstrual cramps and other types of spasms in the body.
